caption: Staying at the Courtyard Marriott for work, so myself and several others from our company have enjoyed food and/or cocktails here. Over the course of several days we were treated to interesting and tasty cocktails and delicious food,  by a staff that knows their stuff. Can't go wrong here!

The cocktails were amazing. The selection, details and unusual combinations were completely impressive. The views are gorgeous and the decor is fantastic. The food was mostly great. We ordered a variety and the disco fries and shrimp wraps …
Awesome drinks, the food is not the usual but still delicious. Would for sure go back.

I think this might be the best cocktail bar I've ever been to. I say cocktail bar but they have food as well. The shrimp cocktails were $1 during happy hour and the disco fries and buffalo cauliflower...fabulous. Where they really shine …
this place is unique and very good drinks. waitress is amazing. wish I got her name. but for drinks really amazing. great prices. 👍

Always an incredible experience!  Owner Aaron DeFeo has quite the gem here in the city.   Inventive and delicious cocktails.   Service is on point and you must order from the food menu. Disco fries, Crispy Chicken sliders and Pho French Dip!  Check out Appertivo Hour all night on Tuesdays.
They didn't have much food and the food they had wasn't really good. They too expensive for the food to be limited and tasteless. Also none of the food is on happy hour. Only 5 drinks
Excellent cocktails!

Visited here yesterday because we were too early for our reservations at a bar down the street. We ended up staying here instead. And then we came back the night after to try more of their cocktails. My favorite bar by far!! And the waitresses both nights were excellent!
Awsome
Was really impressed great ambiance and great food and amazing drinks. We all really enjoyed our meals.  I had the mini fried chicken sandwiches I will definitely be back.
Great little place. Very attentive staff. Great pricing too. Fantastic cocktails
Wow. Just... wow. The drinks were delicious but, dear lord. The food was amazing. Charity seated us and she was the perfect Host. Just a really special evening.
Great atmosphere, very intimate, drinks are for the liquor connoisseur type rather than the normal bar type drinks,  fancy lol

Loved the atmosphere for the little ritual. Great place for a intimate vibe to bring a date. The view ehh not much to it, maybe 4 stars but the service was friendly and the drinks for good. Busy during the weekend, reservation only, during the week tho  👌🏽

Over all it was great. Experience at door not great. I forgot my mask and he said I could not enter. I said what if I take the 8 steps to the bar, sit down and start drinking, he said no. I asked if he has masks to give so I can enter , he …

The drinks in this place is Top Notch...The view amazing . But, having a fancy delicious drinks  and delicios entrees is the plan. But, hot wings? Seriously? 🤔 I don't blame my partner to order that but I never expected that type of food in there.
Omg the fries are to die for would eat again and again and if you like ur drinks strong this is the place

What a wonderful gem found on the fourth floor of the hotel. Great views and really nice decor. Had a lovely time here with some friends. Chanel was a helpful server and super friendly. Will come again!
The location of the bar was perfect. We can easily go to this place whenever we want. The theme of this place was very professional. We spent a good time here with my colleagues. Great!
Great drinks. Yummy food. Great staff.

The cocktails are multi layered works if art. Such delicious flavor profiles in the ones we had. Our server Andy was so helpful and knowledgeable. The food was also perfectly seasoned and prepared with attention to details

Service was fast. We were not aware of being able to make reservations and we were still helped pretty fast. The food and drinks were good. Only thing is we got a small table by the window and it was a little awkward to eat from but besides that, the staff was friendly and it was a cute place especially for a date night.
Tons of fun drinks. And a Pho French Dip to die for.
Fantastic evening with welcome drinks, our fries were WAY too spicy but the service was the best I’ve had in a long time. Every single person working was enthusiastic, kind, and caring.
Omgosh!! So freaking delicious 👌🏾👌🏾👌🏾 You can taste all the different fresh flavors in every single bite. I loved my sliders 🤗

This new addition to downtown Phoenix is an amazing nostalgic trip. They just need a Gemco drink! We had a window seat at night right before a game and loved just watching the crowds and night till away.

A bit hard to find, but I recommend trying. You'll find it tucked away in one of the floors of the Marriot. It has a very vintage, fun, classy vibe but the staff makes it feel very laid back. Time is taken perfecting your unique drinks and making you feel at home.
Fun drinks that are out of this world.
Great atmosphere and a decent view. Lots of really fun drinks, but I never found one I adored for the price.

Unexpected surprise. The service was fantastic. Felt that the servers and bartenders were truly interested in you enjoying your visit. Views to the east are good during the evening/night. Prepare for your visit with an open mind. The drink …
Great addition to a new hotel in downtown Phoenix. This is a top notch bar that will open up those taste buds for sure! Check it out.

New bar on the 4th floor of the Residence Inn / Courtyard by Marriott across from Talking Stick Arena in Downtown PHX. Aaron Defeo has whipped up some incredible cocktails. Late night bar food until 1am!  Speaking of food, I recommend the burger. Fantastic burger.
Great place to go for cocktails or dinner!

Great atmosphere, cool setup. The bar has a great selection. BTAC was also available at reasonable prices. Great views of downtown Phoenix. The chefs board was very good. My wife loved the Coupette Colada.
Great low key time.
Fun setting, great ambiance. The menu is beautiful and interesting. Snackies looked good, but we didn't eat anything. The cocktails were solid. Good service.
All the drinks are amazing! The Country Bumpkin is a must try, as well as a Touch of Evil.
Good atmosphere, great drink choices, and good service.

I'll start with saying I have the absolute highest level of Marriott rewards you can have. I stay there seven months out of the year, most years, due to business travel. My initial experience was fine. Had a drink with my GF in the …

Nice Chic little bar,. Everyone must have a seat they try to keep people from having to stand so that means it keeps the bar to a smaller croud. Very unique  infused drinks. Not affiliated with the Marriott and does have its own.  I've been here twice now and both have been a great. Definitely worth the visit.

My husband and I really enjoyed our experience. So much we are bringing our friends back on Friday. We decided to check it out after a Suns game. We sat right by a window over looking the Sun's arena. The ambiance was perfect. The drink was …
Small cocktail bar on the 4th floor. Intimate atmosphere.
Excellent cocktails. Creative yet classic.
Very nice upscale bar with great and very unique craft cocktails!
Amazing food, fresh and perfectly seasoned.
Simply put this place is so much fun, great staff, great drinks, great atmosphere.
Drinks and service and atmosphere were great. Prices are a little high. $9 for a happy HR drink is a little much.
One of the best cocktail lounges in downtown PHX
Literally is the best hotel bar in Phoenix.  Great views, service,  cheese and charcuterie board, and incredible cocktail list.
Great cocktails and their presentation. The food we tried was also good, though it is more of a drink place. Good ambience but a bit loud.
Creative cocktail list with friendly and knowledgeable bartenders. Great views of downtown to the east.
Love the ambiance and the food was amazing. Definitely recommend for a business meeting or to catch up with your friends.
Great cocktails and food. Warm and friendly service.
Definitely a Downtown Phx spot to check out. Great drinks!
Super cute place for a nice cocktail. A little pricey, but worth it every once in a while. Try the fries!
Unique cocktails and amazing atmosphere
the same people as bitter and twisted, but the cocktails here are not quite as good. The service is wonderful. The space is nicer than bitter and twisted. Great place to bring a date.
Good setting (surprisingly) over looking the talking stick arena. Food was good, drinks strong and the setting was chill.
Fancy but relaxing
Cocktails are super tasty and interesting, the staff is friendly and helpful, the fries are SOOOOOOO good, and the place itself is decorated all hip and trendy!
Really good and unique drinks, cosy place and good service.
Love the craft cocktails. Bartender Keith is a great psychologist and makes for an enjoyable experience. Awesome atmosphere!
Worst experience ever- DO NOT WASTE your time at this bar. Waste of money and time spent at this spot.  They fake what they sell.  Find a bar less confrontational.

My wife and I came here for drinks before a concert.  The view was fantastic and the drink menu was very creative.  I had the Paloma and my wife enjoyed the Cask of Amontillado.  The drinks were really well made strong. The atmosphere was …
not too shabby for a hotel bar

Great menu, Andy the bartender was super knowledgeable and helpful and made us some delicious cocktails. The lounge itself is very chiq and a great backdrop for small get together. Will definitely be back.
It's a nice little Store where you can get different healing stone's and different stuff

Great spot to meet up with friends before heading out for the evening and not what I would expect from a bar in a hotel. We went as a rather large group (10+) and we were never treated like we were a burden. The service was top notch with …
Very cute, classy atmosphere. Excellent craft drinks and wonderful service! Definitely going back again!
This place is awesome drinks are amazing and beautiful. Hidden gem inside a hotel.

Uniquely handcrafted libations with a downtown view. Incredibly tasty and thoughtful! I suggest adding a "Shot in the dark" to whatever you order! Overall, a bit pricey, but very stylish, worthwhile, and upscale. French fries are authentic Belgian-style!! Nice touches throughout.
Specialty drinks. Delicious french fries and a nice view. Perfect for an after work drink.
Good drinks. A little place in the Resident Inn down from the stadium. Burger was delicious and we shared!
Top top top top notch cocktails and the food is perfectly matched. If you want some of the most creative cocktails in a chill atmosphere this is the spot.
Talk about intimacy and sexy... This place has a posh speakeasy feel with the atmoshere to back it up. The cocktails are pretty good too ;) Will be back for more.
My brother who is a bar manager suggested this place. The drinks were delicious, the service was impeccable, and the music/ambiance was perfect. I'll definitely return.
Love this place!
Nice views and very interesting drinks. The shot on the dark is always fun, plus they offer table/group drinks that are fun!

A spectualar find! The vibe was trendy and chill and the interior design overall was full of unique details. I sat at the bar and was very impressed with the menu. The drink list was unique and I had a hard time narrowing down my options. I …

Little Rituals is a more intimate experience than Bitter and Twisted, located downstairs. Interesting cocktail menu (their Old Fashioned is spectacular) and friendly staff. Good date spot. Didn't try the food, but it seems a little on the pricey side.

The drink list is very comprehensive. The decor, however, is too safe and hotel sterile for the experience that is promulgated. I didn't feel like I was anywhere specific. Overall, service was solid and the cocktails were clearly artistic.

Cute and intimate. Amazing for a date night or just hanging out and catching up with friends. The drinks are unique and presented beautifully. The staff is young, hip, and amazingly friendly. I haven't tried the good yet but it looks delicious.
This place is amazing. Great bartenders, great atmosphere, and great service.

One of the coolest cocktail bars I've been to in downtown Phoenix. The bar is located on the 4th floor of the building and overlooks the front entrance to the Talking Stick Arena. The ambience and atmosphere of the bar was very modern and …

Service was not great. They gave us an odd table even though the one next to us was open for at least an hour and they said we couldn't sit there. Then when we asked to split the bill, the waitress got an attitude even though she didn't …
Good place for a nice adult beverage
(Translated by Google) Delicious drinks  (Original) Delicious dranks
Amazing cocktails
Great cocktail and dining program in a hip and intimate setting with a view
Inventive menu and creative cocktails served with humor and grace.
Cool place to drink 😁
Classy
Unusual but delicious cocktails and great service.  Music was a little too loud for conversation.
Amazing vibe, food is great. Drinks are a hit and miss but still cool to try them
Classy Bar and love the romantic setting. My only complaint is this bar should have more domestic beers to choose from. Please consider this in the future.

Was there with a group and asked for non-alcoholic options. Was made to feel very uncomfortable by my server when I expressed that I didn't want the "alcohol free" drinks that taste like they have alcohol.  It made for a very poor and uncomfortable experience.
The place was a secret... Drinks were one of a kind.
Great Drinks and Bites
Great staff, great craft coctails
Fantastic bar and food menu. Love this place!
Pretty chill alternative to Bitter and Twisted. Awesome drinks
Fantastic little secret cocktail spot hidden in a hotel. Thought I was impressed by the drinks then tried a couple things off the food menu...oh my goodness!!
They have the best cocktails in Phoenix.
Good place
Great ambiance, nice staff, and the cocktails are delicious!
Great location ! Perfect stop before a concert, or game.  Loved the espresso martinis!
I love this place but shhhh it's our secret. Don't let the normies find out

Wow! The drinks ate truly works of art made by master mixologists and the food was amazing too! The service was unparalleled and each person I spoke with truly wanted me to have a great time. We definitely did! I recommend making reservations.
Perfect place for happy hour
Great spot but watch out for the "friendly 2oz pour" surprise upcharge.
Great place to come and get a bite to eat and then have a drink at the bar sharing it with friends.little Rituals great place to unwind, great atmosphere.
Lovely little bar inside the Marriott with fantastic servers and the best drinks I've ever had. Loved it!

Fantastic new cocktail bar. I was surprised this little out of the way gem had some great creations served in a comfortable atmosphere. Great for a date or friends catching up. Music is an accompaniment to conversation - not an obstacle like some places.

Excellent cocktail selection. Great presentation. Lots of different seating types to serve various needs (communal, one-on-one by the large windows, booth seating). Umami fries were decent (could be a little crisper). Great location downtown and one of the best cocktail spots found in a nice hotel in Phoenix.
Had a great time. Drinks on point!
Emily was AMAZING! She helped us accommodate an ever increasing crowd, made fantastic drink recommendations.  In fact, all the staff were pretty incredible!
An amazing laid back chill out bar. Wonderful menu and amazing selection of cocktails.
Elevated city view, swank style, friendly staff, and killer mixed drinks.  Definitely worth a visit.
Great cocktails, and the bartender will custom-create one for you.

A new addition to the collection of speakeasy-style cocktail bars in downtown Phoenix. Supplying classy downtown style and a variety of inspired house cocktails, also knowledgeable staff given freedom to craft enjoyable cocktails off-menu
Cute and nice cocktails. A little pricey though
Interesting and unique bar, for being so chaotic the service was still amazing
Nice spot, relaxed atmosphere. Extensive cocktail list a little pricey but worth it
Great staff (talented, creative and always willing to help) and a beautiful facility!
Great cocktails and the food was good!
This place is a little gem. Highly recommend it's a very nice downtown bar with a lovely selection  of drinks. It's a quiet atmosphere so keep that in mind

This Little Rituals just opened a few months ago and it's a new hot spots for cocktails, snack and food. More mainly on the cocktails, it's opened by the same owner of the "Bitter & Twisted", Bitter & Twisted is voted as having one of the …
Nice vibe,  decent drink selections,  and friendly staff. Kinda pricey though.

Very innovative well balanced cocktails and a super inviting, hospitable staff. Chanel and Richard are amazing people to spend an evening with at the bar. Aaron aka "Doc" one of the owners, is literally one of the most knowledgeable bar  people ive ever met, and also so humble and welcoming. I would live here if someone would let me
Great space and great service! Drinks were fast and carefully crafted. I'd you like your cocktails created with care and don't want to deal with noisy dark environments, this is your place.
It sucks

Everything you want in a lounge. Hard to find (you really need to pay attention if you want inside this speakeasy-style watering hole) Hard to find is a positive attribute in this case. Great cocktail and whiskey selection. Live music was a …

Love this place! It's the perfect spot to grab a couple drinks after work or on the way to an event downtown. I met up with a friend here, wait was about fifteen minutes, but you might be able to make reservations.. definitely check! The …

As a local, I was excited to hear about a new lounge in my area. I walked over to little rituals on a weekend evening and was very disappointed. The wait staff was rude and seemed very unhappy to be there. The establishment itself is …
Get yourself a Bobby Burns and the Lo Mein and you're set 🤙

Read about the opening in the paper,  but missed the part about it being in the Marriot; Absolutely no signage out front or street # on the building.  Anyways, stopped in for a beer and Luck of the Draw shot, quite good, will be back.
Nice but no one there

We thought we would try out a new cocktail bar, but we're met with an off putting experience. It started off with the doorman asking us for our name that we put on the list 30 mins earlier. After confirming we walked up 5 feet to the desk …

So in order to get in, it is on 4th floor, most of the times they have the bouncer at the elevator so he can provide you a key to get in. They have a old retro machine that lets you buy a beer with a coin! I think the beer was around $3. …
Omg. So great! The drinks are absolutely divine, and the staff is incredibly knowledgeable. We just wished we had a map or a punchcard so we can keep track and try everything!
This place blew me away.  Want to have a drink in a upscale environment.  This is another must for drinks in downtown Phoenix.

My husband and I had the chance to visit Little Rituals on Friday night. We were blown away by the detail and luxury feel of this gem. As you walk through the door you are greeted by a stunning chandelier that sparkles complimenting the …

Swanky little spot tucked away on the fourth floor of the Residence Inn. Who would have thought? Amazing craft cocktails where the bartenders make almost every ingredient from scratch. Take some time to check this one out. Oh and make sure to look closely at any of the ice cubes.
Very cool atmosphere and fun drinks to try.
Nice city view and cool setup
Try the Umami fries!
Beautiful bar doing everything right. So envious of the menu design and the time, effort and money that went into it.
The drinks were really good!!
Amazing veiw, mind blowing cocktails and outstanding food. Brilliant concept 👌
Amazing cocktails!!!

By a wide margin, the classiest and most interesting cocktail bar in the area. Brooding, yet intimate. Stylish, but unpretentious. Go there and try everything. Or if you don't see anything you like, they'll make you something you do. Just go.

(Translated by Google) Great cocktails and beautifully served. I love the variety of flavors and combinations. I recommend the martini and the redcurrant fix.  Excellent cocktails with a variety of flavors and a good presentation. I …

Great experience on their second day open.  I have to admit that the cocktails are better than their neighbor, Bitter and Twisted.  The food isn't really anything to brag about at this point, but it wasn't bad and the service and cocktails more than make up for it's shortcomings.

A friend and I went here only to pass time while we waited for our reservations at another bar. Had a great experience. Decor was beautiful, drinks were bomb, and the atmosphere was really chill. Only reason I gave 4 stars is because …
Classy new addition to the bar industry in downtown Phoenix.
